note:
Greetings! I am an {$b.1987} year-old man who loves Linux/FOSS and wishes to specialize and dedicate his first lifetime to Biology.

Unfortunately, while attending the Univ. of Washington for Biology, I was diagnosed (later w/) Schizoaffective disorder and my life came crashing down.
I am increasingly traditional but will never be a GoPper.
"The Soul of Humanity was not split into billions of pieces."
"The Soul is a constituent and inseparable component of the Universe."
WA, USA.
